short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add several convenient fuctions to redmine pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
chrome extension for adding advantages of redmine

Features

- Issue list coloring
- Display detail time on detail issue view
- Emphasis my assigned issue
- Show attachment images with layer
